name: Roza's Rapier
description:
Venture into a evil land to kill its king.

Finish the first three levels in any order you want.  With each level defeated the enemies get stronger and some learn new moves but you learn new moves as well.

CONTROLS

z: attack

x: block

s: heal (when unlocked)

down + z: spark attack (when unlocked)

x+z: spin attack (when unlocked)
